name: Fetching Sticks
description:
Fetching Sticks is a visual novel created for the GameDev.tv 2022 Game Jam. 

A dog with a blank collar journeys down a mysterious river… Solve puzzles to unlock key memories and discover who they are.

How to Play

Use the left mouse button to press buttons and click on the white arrow to advance dialogue. Click and drag puzzle pieces to move them into the correct slots.

Content warning: This game includes themes of death and loss that some players may find upsetting
